)

  start_cell="A1",
  end_cell="C1",

  bg_color="CCCCCC"
)

2. File paths: Use simple filenames, not absolute paths
   âœ… Correct: "report.xlsx"

3. Cell references: Use Excel notation (A1, B2, etc.)
   âœ… Correct: start_cell="A1", end_cell="C10"

4. Colors: Use hex codes without #
   âœ… Correct: bg_color="FF0000" (red)
   âŒ Wrong: bg_color="#FF0000"

5. Formulas: Include = sign
   âœ… Correct: formula="=SUM(A1:A10)"
   âŒ Wrong: formula="SUM(A1:A10)"
